name: Road Skill
description:
Welcome to Road Skill! How far can you run while collecting coins, dodging traffic and keeping your wits about you?! Earn coins to play as one of four characters, with varying abilities such as super speed, stopping power and flying! Can you earn the ultimate respect from your friends and foes alike and unlock a rainbow? Good luck!

NEW! Added new levels so you can play in the sun, fog and night time! Also redesigned main menu and reduced coins needed to play as characters with abilities!

Created by Craig, edited and released on iOS by Steve.
